casebody.data:
No. 11-604. EM Ltd., et al., Petitioners v. Republic of Argentina, et al. 565 U.S. 1154, 132 S. Ct. 1133,

181 L. Ed. 2d 974,

2012 U.S. LEXIS 875. January 17, 2012.

The Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 652 F.3d 172, 414 Fed. Appx. 514.
